name: Mercedes-Benz EQE SUV
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz EQE SUV, a 5 seater SUV, starts from  of Rs. 1.39 Crore. It is available in 1 variant and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. EQE SUV has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 9 airbags. Mercedes-Benz EQE SUV is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 550 Km for EQE SUV.

variants.variant_name: EQE SUV 500 4MATIC 90.56 kWh, Electric, Automatic, 550 Km
